Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Atonement: Delivers an attack with a potency of 400.</br>Additional Effect: Restores MP</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Sword Oath.
Class_Skill_Desc_Blade of Faith: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 220 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Requiescat Potency: 720</br>Combo Action: Confiteor</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Blade of Truth: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 320 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Requiescat Potency: 820</br>Combo Action: Blade of Faith</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Blade of Valor: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 420 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Requiescat Potency: 920</br>Combo Action: Blade of Truth</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Circle of Scorn: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140 to all nearby enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Damage over time</br>Potency: 30</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Clemency: Restores target's HP.</br>Cure Potency: 1,000</br>Additional Effect: Restores to self 50% of HP restored to target if target is a party member
Class_Skill_Desc_Confiteor: Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 420 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Requiescat Potency: 920</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 400</br>//Can only be executed while under the effect of Confiteor Ready. Effect fades upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Cover: Take all damage intended for another party member as long as said member remains within 10 yalms.</br>Does not activate with certain attacks.</br>Duration: 12s</br>Oath Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Divine Veil: Creates a barrier around self and all party members near you that absorbs damage equivalent to 10% of your maximum HP.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Additional Effect: Restores target's HP</br>Cure Potency: 400//
Class_Skill_Desc_Expiacion: Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 450 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Additional Effect: Restores MP
Class_Skill_Desc_Fast Blade: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Class_Skill_Desc_Goring Blade: Delivers an attack with a potency of 700.</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_Hallowed Ground: Renders you impervious to most attacks.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Holy Circle: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Divine Might Potency: 200</br>Requiescat Potency: 300</br>The effect of Divine Might will be prioritized over Requiescat when under the effect of both.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 400//
Class_Skill_Desc_Holy Sheltron: Reduces damage taken by 15%.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Resolve</br>Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15%</br>Duration: 4s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Benediction</br>Knight's Benediction Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Duration: 12s</br>Oath Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Holy Spirit: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 350.</br>Divine Might Potency: 450//</br>Requiescat Potency: 650</br>The effect of Divine Might will be prioritized over Requiescat when under the effect of both.//</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 400//
Class_Skill_Desc_Interject: Interrupts the use of a target's action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Intervene: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 150.</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Intervention: Reduces target party member's damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage reduction by an additional 10% if Rampart or Sentinel are active</br>Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Resolve to target</br>Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%</br>Duration: 4s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Knight's Benediction to target</br>Knight's Benediction Effect: Gradually restores HP</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Duration: 12s</br>//Oath Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Iron Will: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.
Class_Skill_Desc_Last Bastion: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 80%.</br>Duration: 12s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Atonement: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.</br>Additional Effect: Restores own HP</br>Cure Potency: 4,000</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Sword Oath.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blade of Faith: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 7,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50% when target is under the effect of Sacred Claim</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Sacred Claim</br>Sacred Claim Effect: Restores HP when successfully landing an attack on targets under this effect</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Blade of Faith Ready.</br>※Action changes to Blade of Truth upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blade of Truth: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 8,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50% when target is under the effect of Sacred Claim</br>Combo Action: Blade of Faith</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Sacred Claim</br>Sacred Claim Effect: Restores HP when successfully landing an attack on targets under this effect</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Action changes to Blade of Valor upon execution.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Blade of Valor: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 9,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Potency is increased by 50% when target is under the effect of Sacred Claim</br>Combo Action: Blade of Truth</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Sacred Claim</br>Sacred Claim Effect: Restores HP when successfully landing an attack on targets under this effect</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 10s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Confiteor: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 12,000 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Sacred Claim</br>Sacred Claim Effect: Restores HP when successfully landing an attack on targets under this effect</br>Cure Potency: 3,000</br>Duration: 10s</br>This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Fast Blade: Delivers an attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Guardian: Rush to a target party member's side.</br>Additional Effect: Take all damage intended for the targeted party member</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed when member is closer than 10 yalms.</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>Has no effect on targets interacting with an object.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Holy Sheltron: Grants Holy Sheltron and Knight's Resolve.</br>Holy Sheltron Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency</br>Duration: 4s</br>If the barrier is not absorbed and the effect duration expires, deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency equal to 150% of the barrier's remaining potency.</br>Knight's Resolve Effect: Reduces damage taken by 20%</br>Duration: 8s</br>Additional Effect: Heavy +75%</br>Duration: 5s
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Intervene: Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000.</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Sword Oath, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 10s</br>Maximum Charges: 2</br>Cannot be executed while bound.</br>※Royal Authority Combo changes to Atonement while under the effect of Sword Oath.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Phalanx: Grants the effect of Hallowed Ground to self and Phalanx to nearby party members.</br>Hallowed Ground Effect: Renders you impervious to most attacks</br>Duration: 10s</br>Phalanx Effect: Reduces damage taken by 33%</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Blade of Faith Ready</br>Duration: 10s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 120s</br>※Action changes to Blade of Faith upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Riot Blade: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Combo Action: Fast Blade</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Royal Authority: Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.</br>Combo Action: Riot Blade</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Sword Oath, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Royal Authority Combo changes to Atonement while under the effect of Sword Oath.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_PVP_Shield Bash: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 3s</br>Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Sword Oath, up to a maximum of 3</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Royal Authority Combo changes to Atonement while under the effect of Sword Oath.
Class_Skill_Desc_Passage of Arms: Increases block rate to 100% and creates a designated area in a cone behind you in which party members will only suffer 85% of all damage inflicted.</br>Duration: 18s</br>Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_Prominence: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.</br>Combo Action: Total Eclipse</br>Combo Potency: 170</br>Combo Bonus: Restores MP</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might</br>Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Provoke: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rage of Halone: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Combo Action: Riot Blade</br>Combo Potency: 330
Class_Skill_Desc_Release Iron Will: Cancels the effect of Iron Will.
Class_Skill_Desc_Reprisal: Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Requiescat: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 320.</br>Additional Effect: Grants 4 stacks of Requiescat</br>Requiescat Effect: Increases the potency of Holy Spirit,  Holy Circle, and all Confiteor combo actions/Holy Spirit/Holy Spirit and Holy Circle/Holy Spirit/Holy Spirit,  Holy Circle, and Confiteor/Holy Spirit/Holy Spirit and Holy Circle/Holy Spirit and spells will require no cast time</br>Additional Effect: Grants Confiteor Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Riot Blade: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.</br>Combo Action: Fast Blade</br>Combo Potency: 300</br>Combo Bonus: Restores MP//
Class_Skill_Desc_Royal Authority: Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.</br>Combo Action: Riot Blade</br>Combo Potency: 400</br>Combo Bonus: Grants 3 stacks of Sword Oath</br>Duration: 30s//</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might</br>Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle/ to be cast immediately with increased potency</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Sheltron: Reduces damage taken by 15%.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Oath Gauge Cost: 50
Class_Skill_Desc_Shield Bash: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Stun</br>Duration: 6s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shield Lob: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Class_Skill_Desc_Shield Wall: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 20%.</br>Duration: 10s
Class_Skill_Desc_Shirk: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.
Class_Skill_Desc_Spirits Within: Delivers an attack with a potency of 270.</br>Additional Effect: Restores MP//
Class_Skill_Desc_Stronghold: Reduces damage taken by all party members by 40%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Total Eclipse: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Class_Status_Desc_Blade of Faith Ready: Able to execute Blade of Faith.
Class_Status_Desc_Confiteor: Damage dealt and potency of all HP restoration actions are reduced.
Class_Status_Desc_Divine Veil: A holy barrier is nullifying damage. When barrier is completely absorbed, creates a barrier around all nearby party members.
Class_Status_Desc_Holy Sheltron: A holy barrier is nullifying damage.
Class_Status_Desc_Requiescat: Spells require no time to cast and consume no MP.
Class_Trait_Desc_Chivalry: Restores MP when using Riot Blade or Spirits Within.
Class_Trait_Desc_Divine Magic Mastery: Halves MP cost for all spells while preventing casting interruptions via damage taken. Grants the following effects after successfully completing a combo with Royal Authority:</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might</br>Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Divine Magic Mastery II: Adds a healing effect to Holy Spirit, Holy Circle, and Confiteor.</br>Cure Potency: 400
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Divine Veil: Adds a healing effect to Divine Veil.</br>Cure Potency: 400
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Intervention: Extends the duration of Intervention to 8 seconds.</br>Grants Knight's Resolve to target, reducing damage taken by 10%.</br>Duration: 4s</br>Grants Knight's Benediction to target, gradually restoring HP over time.</br>Cure Potency: 250</br>Duration: 12s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Prominence: Grants the following effects after successfully completing a combo with Prominence:</br>Combo Bonus: Restores MP</br>Combo Bonus: Grants Divine Might</br>Divine Might Effect: Allows next Holy Spirit or Holy Circle to be cast immediately with increased potency</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Requiescat: Grants the effect of Confiteor Ready upon landing Requiescat.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Sheltron: Extends the duration of Sheltron to 6 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Melee Mastery: Increases the potency of Fast Blade to 200, Riot Blade to 140, Royal Authority to 140, Holy Spirit to 350, and Atonement to 400.
Class_Trait_Desc_Oath Mastery: Increases Oath Gauge by 5 each time an auto-attack lands.
Class_Trait_Desc_Rage of Halone Mastery: Upgrades Rage of Halone to Royal Authority.
Class_Trait_Desc_Sword Oath: Grants three stacks of Sword Oath after successfully completing a combo with Royal Authority.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Tank Mastery: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.
